Translations.Text: ya urochysto prysyahayu tsym mistom
misto de vy zhyvete
begetting ta begotten
My utvoryly lyudsʹke isnuvannya popratsyuvaty tyazhki (shchob vykupyty sebe)
vin dumaye shcho niyakyy kozhnyy kolysʹ ne zaklykaye yoho vvazhaty
Vin khvalytʹsya, "ya vytratyv tak sylʹno hroshovyy
vin dumaye shcho niyakyy kozhnyy ne bachytʹ yoho
my ne daly yomu dva ochi
yazyk ta dva huby
my ne pokazaly yomu dva shlyakhy
Vin musytʹ vybraty tyazhkyy shlyakh
Kotryy kozhnyy yavlyaye soboyu tyazhkyy shlyakh
vyzvolyayuchyy rabiv
Hoduyutʹsya, protyahom chasu neharazdiv
Syroty shcho mayutʹsya vidnoshennya
Abo bidnyy khto ye u potrebi
Ta buty odnym z tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ, ta exhorting odyn odnym shchob buty steadfast, ta exhorting odyn odnym shchob buty riznovyd
Tsey zasluzhyly shchastya
Yak dlya tsykh khto disbelieved u nashykh vidkryttyakh, vony zaznaly neshchastya
Vony budutʹ obmezhuvatysya u Hellfire
